add_element

PURPOSE

add entity ELEMENT to cluster C1 of component COMPIND

SYNOPSIS

function g = add_element(g, compind, c, element, ps);

DESCRIPTION 

 add entity ELEMENT to cluster C1 of component COMPIND

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • combinegraphs create direct product of components in graph.
This function is called by:
  • best_split Choose the best split of cluster node C.

0002

0004 
0005 if compind < 0
0006   for j = 1:g.ncomp
0007     g.components{j}.z(element) = g.compinds(c,j);
0008   end
0009 else

0011 end

0013 g.z(element) = 1;
0014 
0015 g.objcount = g.objcount+1;
